welcome.subtitle: Red Unificada de Busqueda de Licitaciones Irregulares — AI-Powered Corruption Detection for Mexican Government Procurement
welcome.step1Desc: We analyze every federal procurement contract from 2002-2025, worth over 9 trillion MXN. Our AI model detects patterns consistent with corruption, validated against 15 real documented cases.
welcome.step2Desc: Each contract receives a risk score (0-1) measuring similarity to documented corruption patterns. Critical (0.50+), High (0.30+), Medium (0.10+), Low (<0.10). Hover over any metric with a help icon for an explanation.
welcome.step3Desc: Search vendors, institutions, and contracts. Track suspicious entities on your Watchlist. Use the Network view to see vendor relationships and potential collusion patterns.
welcome.step4Desc: The Executive Summary gives you a complete overview of procurement risk across all 12 federal sectors. From there, drill into any sector, vendor, or pattern that catches your eye.
